languages.text: {n}Соломон лишь молча прикрывает глаза, лицо его становится отсутствующим.{/n}
{n}Solomorne only silently closes his eyes, his expression turning stony.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон лишь молча прикрывает глаза, лицо его становится отсутствующим.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schließt nur die Augen. Sein Gesicht wirkt wie versteinert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne only silently closes his eyes, his expression turning stony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schließt nur die Augen. Sein Gesicht wirkt wie versteinert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se contente de fermer les yeux sans dire mot, en adoptant une expression impénétrable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne only silently closes his eyes, his expression turning stony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se contente de fermer les yeux sans dire mot, en adoptant une expression impénétrable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはただ黙って目を閉じた。その表情は石のように硬くなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne only silently closes his eyes, his expression turning stony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはただ黙って目を閉じた。その表情は石のように硬くなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se limita a cerrar los ojos con cara de piedra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne only silently closes his eyes, his expression turning stony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se limita a cerrar los ojos con cara de piedra.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙仅仅是默默地闭上了眼睛，脸上没有任何表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne only silently closes his eyes, his expression turning stony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙仅仅是默默地闭上了眼睛，脸上没有任何表情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, gözlerini sessizce yummakla yetiniyor. Yüzü buz kesiyor.{/n}
